datamap-desc: Allows embedding of interactive maps into wiki pages.
datamap-doc-page-does-not-exist: ''Documentation for this data page may be created at [[$1]]''
datamap-error-validate-check-docs: Check the [https://gitlab.mglolenstine.xyz/alex4401/mediawiki-extension-datamaps extension's documentation] for information about the proper structure.
datamap-error-validate-invalid-json: This is not a valid JSON document.
datamap-error-validate-field-no-value: Field $2 in structure $1 requires a value.
datamap-error-validate-field-required-al: Field $2 or an alternative is required in structure $1. $3
datamap-error-validate-wrong-field-type: Field $2 has an incorrect value for structure $1. $3
datamap-error-validate-wrong-item-type: Element in the $2 array has an incorrect value for structure $1. $3
datamap-error-validate-disallowed-value: Field $2 has an unknown value for structure $1. $3
datamap-error-validate-field-required-ei: $1 requires only one of these two fields: $2 or $3. Both cannot be specified at the same time.
datamap-error-validate-exclusive-fields: $1 accepts one and only one of these fields: $2.
datamap-error-validate-replaced-field: Field $2 in structure $1 has been replaced with $3 in version $4, and will be removed in version $5.
datamap-error-validate-deprecated-field: Field $2 in structure $1 has been deprecated in version $3, and will be removed in version $4.
datamap-error-validate-no-file: File [[:File:$1|$1]] linked, but it has not been uploaded yet to the wiki.
datamap-error-validatespec-group-no-disp: Marker group "$1" has no display settings. Add the icon and/or fillColor properties.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-no-group-: A marker group with no (or an empty) name has been defined. Assign it a unique name.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-illegal-g: White-space (such as spaces) is not allowed in names of marker groups: $1.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-illegal-l: White-space (such as spaces) is not allowed in names of marker layers: $1.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-duplicate: One of the data sets has been associated with one layer more than once: $1.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-missing-g: Markers have been added to group "$1", which is not defined.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-bad-mixin: Mix-in "$1" must exist, use the Interactive Data Map content model, and be valid syntax- and structure-wise.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-name-conf: Found marker layer "$1", but a marker group exists with the same name.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-mixin-wit: A mix-in must not use other mix-ins.
datamap-error-validatespec-bgoverlay-inv: Polyline background overlay's path property must be a list of points.
datamap-error-internal-unknown-field-typ: No validation support implemented for field type with ID of $1. This is a bug in the extension's code.
datamap-error-render-unsupported-display: Display mode $1 has been reported for a marker, but support is missing for it. This is a bug in the extension's code.
datamap-error-pf-page-does-not-exist: Data map page "[[$1]]" does not exist.
datamap-error-pf-page-invalid-content-mo: Content model of page "[[$1]]" is not Interactive Data Map.
datamap-error-cannot-preview-validation-:
Edit preview not shown due to error(s) in map's source code:
$1
datamap-javascript-required: Interactive data maps require JavaScript to be enabled.
datamap-error-dataload:
Couldn't load data
please refresh or try again later
datamap-lazy-click-to-load: Click to load the data map
datamap-checklist-prelude: These are the items you can mark as collected:
datamap-interact-touch: Use two fingers to move the map
datamap-interact-scroll: Use CTRL + Scroll to zoom the map
datamap-interact-scroll-mac: Use ⌘ + Scroll to zoom the map
datamap-control-toggle-legend: Tap to expand the legend to toggle markers
datamap-control-centre-view: Center view at current zoom level
datamap-control-search: Click and start typing to search...
